    void Start()
    {
        MainCameraTheStacker = GameObject.Find("MainCameraTheStacker");
        ModeFramesTheStacker = GameObject.Find("FramesTheStacker").transform.Find("ModeFramesTheStacker").gameObject;

        Transform_MobileBlock = GameObject.Find("Transform_MobileBlock");
        Transform_NextBlock1 = GameObject.Find("Transform_NextBlock1");
        Transform_NextBlock2 = GameObject.Find("Transform_NextBlock2");
        Transform_NextBlock3 = GameObject.Find("Transform_NextBlock3");
        Transform_NextBlock4 = GameObject.Find("Transform_NextBlock4");
        Transform_NextBlock5 = GameObject.Find("Transform_NextBlock5");

        Transform_HoldBlock = GameObject.Find("Transform_HoldBlock");

        Transform_ScoreBlock1 = GameObject.Find("Transform_ScoreBlock1");
        Transform_ScoreBlock2 = GameObject.Find("Transform_ScoreBlock2");
        Transform_ScoreBlock3 = GameObject.Find("Transform_ScoreBlock3");
        Transform_ScoreBlock4 = GameObject.Find("Transform_ScoreBlock4");
        Transform_ScoreBlock5 = GameObject.Find("Transform_ScoreBlock5");

        Transform_BonusBlock1 = GameObject.Find("Transform_BonusBlock1");
        Transform_BonusBlock2 = GameObject.Find("Transform_BonusBlock2");
        Transform_BonusBlock3 = GameObject.Find("Transform_BonusBlock3");
        Transform_BonusBlock4 = GameObject.Find("Transform_BonusBlock4");
        Transform_BonusBlock5 = GameObject.Find("Transform_BonusBlock5");

        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1");
        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_2 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_2");
        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3");
        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4");
        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_5 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_5");
        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_6 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_6");
        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_7 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_7");
        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_8 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_8");
        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_9 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_9");
        AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_10 = GameObject.Find("AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_10");

        Text1 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text1");
        Text2 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text2");
        Text3 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text3");
        Text4 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text4");
        Text5 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text5");
        Text6 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text6");
        Text7 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text7");
        Text8 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text8");
        Text9 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text9");
        Text10 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text10");
        Text11 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text11");
        Text12 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text12");
        Text13 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text13");
        Text14 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Text/Text14");

        Letter0 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Letter/Letter0");
        Letter1 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Letter/Letter1");

        Block25 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block25");
        Block26 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block26");
        Block27 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block27");
        Block28 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block28");
        Block29 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block29");
        Block30 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block30");
        Block31 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block31");
        Block32 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block32");
        Block33 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block33");
        Block34 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block34");
        Block35 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block35");
        Block36 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block36");
        Block37 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block37");
        Block38 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block38");
        Block39 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block39");
        Block40 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block40");
        Block41 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block41");
        Block42 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block42");
        Block43 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block43");
        Block44 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block44");
        Block45 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Block/Block45");

        Ghost1 = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Ghost/Ghost1");
        PartGhost = (GameObject)Resources.Load("Object/Ghost/PartGhost");

        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();
        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_2 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_2.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();
        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();
        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();
        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_5 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_5.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();
        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_6 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_6.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();
        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_7 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_7.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();
        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_8 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_8.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();
        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_9 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_9.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();
        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_10 = AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_10.transform.GetComponent<AudioSource>();











        //TheStackerリセット初期呼出
        if (GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker_Used") == null)
        {
            Available_PlayerTheStacker = true;
            CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock = true;
            CanInvokeSummoning_GhostBlock = true;

            CanInvokeDecision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5 = false;
            CanTransferColorOfBlock_NextBlock = true;

            Single = false;
            Double = false;
            Triple = false;

            KindOfBlock_HoldBlock1 = 0;
            KindOfBlock_HoldBlock2 = 0;
            DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1 = 0;
            DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock2 = 0;
            ColorOfBlock_HoldBlock1 = 0;
            ColorOfBlock_HoldBlock2 = 0;

            Ren = 0;
            TotalSummonedMobileBlock = 0;
            TotalDeletedColorGroup_2 = 0;
            TotalDeletedColorCube_2 = 0;
            ComboSummonedMobileBlock = 0;
            ComboDeletedColorCube_2 = 0;
            ComboDeletedColorGroup_2 = 0;
            Score = 0;

            KindOfBlock_NextBlock1 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, KindOfBlock + 1));
            KindOfBlock_NextBlock2 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, KindOfBlock + 1));
            KindOfBlock_NextBlock3 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, KindOfBlock + 1));
            KindOfBlock_NextBlock4 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, KindOfBlock + 1));
            KindOfBlock_NextBlock5 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, KindOfBlock + 1));

            DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock1 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 5));
            DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock2 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 5));
            DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock3 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 5));
            DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock4 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 5));
            DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock5 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 5));

            StartPosition_BonusBlock = 1;

            Invoke("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock", 0f);
        }
        else
        {
            Available_PlayerTheStacker = true;
            CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock = true;

            CanInvokeDecision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5 = true;

            Destroy(GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker"));

            GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker_Used").name = "OtherResourcesTheStacker";

            Transform Transform_PartOtherResourcesTheStacker = GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
            foreach (Transform Transform_PartsOtherResourcesTheStacker in Transform_PartOtherResourcesTheStacker)
            {
                Transform_PartsOtherResourcesTheStacker.gameObject.SetActive(true);
            }

            if (GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("PartMobileBlock") != null)
            {
                GameObject[] GameObject_PartMobileBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("PartMobileBlock");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_PartsMobileBlock in GameObject_PartMobileBlock)
                {
                    GameObject_PartsMobileBlock.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = true;
                }
            }
            GameObject[] GameObject_OtherCube = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("OtherCube");
            foreach (GameObject GameObject_OtherCubes in GameObject_OtherCube)
            {
                GameObject_OtherCubes.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = true;
            }
            GameObject[] GameObject_RedCube_1 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("RedCube_1");
            foreach (GameObject GameObject_RedCubes_1 in GameObject_RedCube_1)
            {
                GameObject_RedCubes_1.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = true;
            }
            GameObject[] GameObject_RedCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("RedCube_2");
            foreach (GameObject GameObject_RedCubes_2 in GameObject_RedCube_2)
            {
                GameObject_RedCubes_2.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = true;
            }
            GameObject[] GameObject_GreenCube_1 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GreenCube_1");
            foreach (GameObject GameObject_GreenCubes_1 in GameObject_GreenCube_1)
            {
                GameObject_GreenCubes_1.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = true;
            }
            GameObject[] GameObject_GreenCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GreenCube_2");
            foreach (GameObject GameObject_GreenCubes_2 in GameObject_GreenCube_2)
            {
                GameObject_GreenCubes_2.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = true;
            }
            GameObject[] GameObject_BlueCube_1 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BlueCube_1");
            foreach (GameObject GameObject_BlueCubes_1 in GameObject_BlueCube_1)
            {
                GameObject_BlueCubes_1.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = true;
            }
            GameObject[] GameObject_BlueCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BlueCube_2");
            foreach (GameObject GameObject_BlueCubes_2 in GameObject_BlueCube_2)
            {
                GameObject_BlueCubes_2.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = true;
            }

            Invoke("Destruction_ScoreBlock", 0);
            Invoke("Summoning_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //Invoke("Staining_MobileBlock", 0);
            //Invoke("Staining_NextBlock", 0);
            //Invoke("Staining_HoldBlock", 0);
            //Invoke("Staining_ScoreBlock", 0);
        }
    }







    void Update()
    {
        //ショートカットキー
        if (CanUseShortCutKey == true)
        {

            {
                QU = true;
            }
            else
            {
                QU = false;

            }
        }

        if (Available_PlayerTheStacker == true)
        {


            //TheStackerリセット再呼出
            if (GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("PartMobileBlock") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") == null & CanInvokeDecision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5 == true)
            {
                CanInvokeDecision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5 = false;

                Invoke("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5", 0.5f);
            }
            if (GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") != null | GameObject.FindWithTag("PartMobileBlock") != null | GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") != null | GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") != null | GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") != null)
            {
                CanInvokeDecision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5 = true;

                CancelInvoke("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5");
            }




            //CollidersBlockアクティブ化
            if(GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") != null)
            {
                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.Find("CollidersBlock").gameObject.SetActive(true);
            }












            //MobileBlock操作
            if (GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") != null)
            {
                //MobileBlock操作(下移動)
                if (S & !D & !A & !E & !Q)
                {
                    Invoke("IntermittentDownMovement_MobileBlock", 0);
                }
                //MobileBlock操作(右移動)
                if (D & !S & !A & !E & !Q)
                {
                    if (CanInvokeIntermittentRightMovement_MobileBlock == true)
                    {
                        CanInvokeIntermittentRightMovement_MobileBlock = false;

                        Invoke("IntermittentRightMovement_MobileBlock", 0);
                        Invoke("ContinuousRightMovement_MobileBlock", 0.25f);
                    }
                }
                if (DU)
                {
                    CanInvokeIntermittentRightMovement_MobileBlock = true;

                    CancelInvoke("ContinuousRightMovement_MobileBlock");
                }
                //MobileBlock操作(左移動)
                if (A & !S & !D & !E & !Q)
                {
                    if (CanInvokeIntermittentLeftMovement_MobileBlock == true)
                    {
                        CanInvokeIntermittentLeftMovement_MobileBlock = false;

                        Invoke("IntermittentLeftMovement_MobileBlock", 0);
                        Invoke("ContinuousLeftMovement_MobileBlock", 0.25f);
                    }
                }
                if (AU)
                {
                    CanInvokeIntermittentLeftMovement_MobileBlock = true;

                    CancelInvoke("ContinuousLeftMovement_MobileBlock");
                }
                //MobileBlock操作(右回転) 
                if (ED & !S & !D & !A & !Q)
                {
                    Invoke("IntermittentRightRoll_MobileBlock", 0);
                }
                //MobileBlock操作(左回転)
                if (QD & !S & !D & !A & !E)
                {
                    Invoke("IntermittentLeftRoll_MobileBlock", 0);
                }
            }








            //MobileBlock自由落下
            if (GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") != null)
            {
                if (!S & CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock == true |
                    S & D & CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock == true |
                    S & A & CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock == true |
                    S & E & CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock == true |
                    S & Q & CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock == true
                   )
                {
                    CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock = false;
                    Invoke("FreeFalling_MobileBlock", FreeFallRate_MobileBlock);
                }
                if (S & !D & !A & !E & !Q)
                {
                    CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock = true;
                    CancelInvoke("FreeFalling_MobileBlock");
                }
            }












            //MobileBlock自由落下レート
            switch (Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000))
            {
                case 0:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.60f;
                    break;
                case 1:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.55f;
                    break;
                case 2:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.50f;
                    break;
                case 3:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.45f;
                    break;
                case 4:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.40f;
                    break;
                case 5:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.35f;
                    break;
                case 6:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.30f;
                    break;
                case 7:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.25f;
                    break;
                case 8:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.20f;
                    break;
                case 9:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.15f;
                    break;
                case 10:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.10f;
                    break;
                case 11:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.09f;
                    break;
                case 12:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.08f;
                    break;
                case 13:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.07f;
                    break;
                case 14:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.06f;
                    break;
                case 15:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.05f;
                    break;
                case 16:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.04f;
                    break;
                case 17:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.03f;
                    break;
                case 18:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.02f;
                    break;
                case 19:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.01f;
                    break;
                case 20:
                    FreeFallRate_MobileBlock = 0.00f;
                    break;
            }













            //Hold機能
            if (GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") != null)
            {
                if (WD & !S & !D & !A & !E & !Q)
                {
                    if (KindOfBlock_HoldBlock1 == 0 & DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1 == 0 & ColorOfBlock_HoldBlock1 == 0 & CanInvokeSummoning_HoldBlock == true)
                    {
                        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_8.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_8.clip);
                        CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                        CanInvokeSummoning_HoldBlock = false;
                        CanInvokeSummoning_GhostBlock = false;

                        KindOfBlock_HoldBlock1 = KindOfBlock_MobileBlock;
                        DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1 = DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock;
                        ColorOfBlock_HoldBlock1 = ColorOfBlock_MobileBlock;

                        Invoke("Destruction_MobileBlock", 0f);
                        Invoke("Summoning_HoldBlock", 0f);
                        Invoke("Destruction_GhostBlock", 0);
                    }
                    if (KindOfBlock_HoldBlock1 != 0 & DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1 != 0 & ColorOfBlock_HoldBlock1 != 0 & CanInvokeSummoning_HoldBlock == true)
                    {
                        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_8.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_8.clip);
                        CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                        CanInvokeSummoning_HoldBlock = false;
                        CanInvokeSummoning_GhostBlock = true;

                        KindOfBlock_HoldBlock2 = KindOfBlock_MobileBlock;
                        DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock2 = DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock;
                        ColorOfBlock_HoldBlock2 = ColorOfBlock_MobileBlock;
                        Invoke("Destruction_MobileBlock", 0f);
                        KindOfBlock_MobileBlock = KindOfBlock_HoldBlock1;
                        DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1;
                        ColorOfBlock_MobileBlock = ColorOfBlock_HoldBlock1;
                        Invoke("Destruction_HoldBlock", 0f);
                        KindOfBlock_HoldBlock1 = KindOfBlock_HoldBlock2;
                        DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1 = DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock2;
                        ColorOfBlock_HoldBlock1 = ColorOfBlock_HoldBlock2;
                        Invoke("Summoning_HoldBlock", 0f);

                        StartPositionOf1Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 11));
                        StartPositionOf2Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 10));
                        StartPositionOf3Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 9));
                        StartPositionOf4Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 8));
                        StartPositionOf5Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 8));

                        Invoke("Summoning_MobileBlock", 0f);
                        if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                        {
                            Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                        }
                    }
                }
            }





            //Score換算
            if (GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("PartMobileBlock") == null | GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("PartMobileBlock") == null | GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("PartMobileBlock") == null)
            {
                if (CanInvokeCalculate_ScoreTheStacaker == true)
                {
                    CanInvokeCalculate_ScoreTheStacaker = false;
                    Invoke("Calculate_ScoreTheStacaker", 1);
                }
            }
            if (GameObject.FindWithTag("PartMobileBlock") != null)
            {
                CancelInvoke("Calculate_ScoreTheStacaker");
                CanInvokeCalculate_ScoreTheStacaker = true;
            }








            //Pause画面
            if (SpaceD)
            {
                MainCameraTheStacker.gameObject.SetActive(false);

                //BestScore更新
                if (
                    Score >= BestScore//PlayerPrefs.GetInt("SaveData_BestScore")
                    )
                {
                    PlayerLogIn_Control.BestScore = Score;





                    NCMBObject TheStacker = new NCMBObject("TheStacker");
                    NCMBQuery<NCMBObject> Query_TheStacker = new NCMBQuery<NCMBObject>("TheStacker");
                    Query_TheStacker.WhereEqualTo("PlayerName", PlayerName);
                    Query_TheStacker.FindAsync((List<NCMBObject> List_TheStacker, NCMBException a) =>
                    {
                        if (a == null)
                        {
                            List_TheStacker[0]["BestScore"] = Score;
                            List_TheStacker[0].SaveAsync();
                        }
                    });






                }

                Available_PlayerTheStacker = false;

                CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock = false;
                CancelInvoke("FreeFalling_MobileBlock");

                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_9.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_9.clip);

                if (GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") != null)
                {
                    GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_PartMobileBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("PartMobileBlock");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_PartsMobileBlock in GameObject_PartMobileBlock)
                {
                    GameObject_PartsMobileBlock.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = false;
                    GameObject_PartsMobileBlock.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_OtherCube = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("OtherCube");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_OtherCubes in GameObject_OtherCube)
                {
                    GameObject_OtherCubes.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = false;
                    GameObject_OtherCubes.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_RedCube_1 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("RedCube_1");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_RedCubes_1 in GameObject_RedCube_1)
                {
                    GameObject_RedCubes_1.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = false;
                    GameObject_RedCubes_1.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_RedCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("RedCube_2");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_RedCubes_2 in GameObject_RedCube_2)
                {
                    GameObject_RedCubes_2.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = false;
                    GameObject_RedCubes_2.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_GreenCube_1 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GreenCube_1");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_GreenCubes_1 in GameObject_GreenCube_1)
                {
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_1.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = false;
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_1.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_GreenCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GreenCube_2");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_GreenCubes_2 in GameObject_GreenCube_2)
                {
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_2.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = false;
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_2.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_BlueCube_1 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BlueCube_1");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_BlueCubes_1 in GameObject_BlueCube_1)
                {
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_1.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = false;
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_1.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_BlueCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BlueCube_2");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_BlueCubes_2 in GameObject_BlueCube_2)
                {
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_2.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = false;
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_2.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_NextBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("NextBlock");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_NextBlocks in GameObject_NextBlock)
                {
                    GameObject_NextBlocks.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_HoldBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("HoldBlock");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_HoldBlocks in GameObject_HoldBlock)
                {
                    GameObject_HoldBlocks.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_BonusBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BonusBlock");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_BonusBlocks in GameObject_BonusBlock)
                {
                    GameObject_BonusBlocks.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }

                DontDestroyOnLoad(GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker"));

                GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker").name = "OtherResourcesTheStacker_Used";

                SceneManager.LoadScene("Pause");
            }






            //FrameMode切替え
            if (FD)
            {
                if (ModeFramesTheStacker.activeSelf == true)
                {
                    ModeFramesTheStacker.gameObject.SetActive(false);
                }
                else
                {
                    ModeFramesTheStacker.gameObject.SetActive(true);
                }
            }




            //GhostMode切替え
            if (GD)
            {
                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                {
                    CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock = false;

                    GameObject[] GameObject_GhostBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GhostBlock");
                    foreach (GameObject GameObject_GhostBlocks in GameObject_GhostBlock)
                    {
                        Destroy(GameObject_GhostBlocks);
                    }
                }
                else
                {
                    CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock = true;

                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                }
            }








            //Cube選別
            if (GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") != null)
            {
                GameObject[] GameObject_OtherCube = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("OtherCube");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_OtherCubes in GameObject_OtherCube)
                {
                    GameObject_OtherCubes.gameObject.name = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_OtherCubes.gameObject.tag = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_OtherCubes.gameObject.layer = 9;
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_RedCube_1 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("RedCube_1");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_RedCubes_1 in GameObject_RedCube_1)
                {
                    GameObject_RedCubes_1.gameObject.name = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_RedCubes_1.gameObject.tag = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_RedCubes_1.gameObject.layer = 9;
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_RedCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("RedCube_2");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_RedCubes_2 in GameObject_RedCube_2)
                {
                    GameObject_RedCubes_2.gameObject.name = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_RedCubes_2.gameObject.tag = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_RedCubes_2.gameObject.layer = 9;
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_GreenCube_1 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GreenCube_1");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_GreenCubes_1 in GameObject_GreenCube_1)
                {
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_1.gameObject.name = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_1.gameObject.tag = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_1.gameObject.layer = 9;
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_GreenCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GreenCube_2");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_GreenCubes_2 in GameObject_GreenCube_2)
                {
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_2.gameObject.name = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_2.gameObject.tag = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_GreenCubes_2.gameObject.layer = 9;
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_BlueCube_1 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BlueCube_1");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_BlueCubes_1 in GameObject_BlueCube_1)
                {
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_1.gameObject.name = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_1.gameObject.tag = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_1.gameObject.layer = 9;
                }
                GameObject[] GameObject_BlueCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BlueCube_2");
                foreach (GameObject GameObject_BlueCubes_2 in GameObject_BlueCube_2)
                {
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_2.gameObject.name = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_2.gameObject.tag = "PartMobileBlock";
                    GameObject_BlueCubes_2.gameObject.layer = 9;
                }
            }







            //if (Input.GetKeyDown(KeyCode.Alpha1))
            //{
            //    Score += 10000;

            //    Invoke("Destruction_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //    Invoke("Summoning_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //}
            //if (Input.GetKeyDown(KeyCode.Alpha2))
            //{
            //    Score += 1000;

            //    Invoke("Destruction_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //    Invoke("Summoning_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //}
            //if (Input.GetKeyDown(KeyCode.Alpha3))
            //{
            //    Score += 100;

            //    Invoke("Destruction_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //    Invoke("Summoning_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //}
            //if (Input.GetKeyDown(KeyCode.Alpha4))
            //{
            //    Score += 10;

            //    Invoke("Destruction_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //    Invoke("Summoning_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //}
            //if (Input.GetKeyDown(KeyCode.Alpha0))
            //{
            //    Score = 100000;

            //    Invoke("Destruction_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //    Invoke("Summoning_ScoreBlock", 0);
            //}
            //if (Input.GetKeyDown(KeyCode.Alpha8))
            //{
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("");
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //    Debug.Log("SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock : " + SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock);
            //}
        }
    }

    private void FixedUpdate()
    {
        if (Available_PlayerTheStacker == true)
        {
            //MainCameraTheStacker操作
            if (UpArrow)
            {
                MainCameraTheStacker.transform.eulerAngles += new Vector3(-0.3f, 0, 0);
            }
            if (DownArrow)
            {
                MainCameraTheStacker.transform.eulerAngles += new Vector3(0.3f, 0, 0);
            }
            if (RightArrow)
            {
                MainCameraTheStacker.transform.eulerAngles += new Vector3(0, 0.3f, 0);
            }
            if (LeftArrow)
            {
                MainCameraTheStacker.transform.eulerAngles += new Vector3(0, -0.3f, 0);
            }
            if (RD)
            {
                MainCameraTheStacker.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
            }
        }
    }


    //NextBlock初期色決め
    void Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock was called");

        ColorOfBlock_NextBlock1 = Mathf.RoundToInt(Random.Range(0.5f, ColorOfBlock + 0.4f));
        ColorOfBlock_NextBlock2 = Mathf.RoundToInt(Random.Range(0.5f, ColorOfBlock + 0.4f));
        ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3 = Mathf.RoundToInt(Random.Range(0.5f, ColorOfBlock + 0.4f));
        ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 = Mathf.RoundToInt(Random.Range(0.5f, ColorOfBlock + 0.4f));
        ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5 = Mathf.RoundToInt(Random.Range(0.5f, ColorOfBlock + 0.4f));

        //if (
        //    ColorOfBlock_NextBlock1 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock2 & ColorOfBlock_NextBlock2 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3 & ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 |
        //    ColorOfBlock_NextBlock2 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3 & ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 & ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5
        //    )
        //{
        //    Invoke("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock", 0f);
        //}
        //else
        //{
        //    Invoke("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5", 0f);
        //}
        Invoke("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5", 0f);
    }
    //NextBlock再色決め
    void Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5 was called");

        if (CanTransferColorOfBlock_NextBlock == true)
        {
            CanTransferColorOfBlock_NextBlock = false;

            ColorOfBlock_MobileBlock = ColorOfBlock_NextBlock1;
            ColorOfBlock_NextBlock1 = ColorOfBlock_NextBlock2;
            ColorOfBlock_NextBlock2 = ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3;
            ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3 = ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4;
            ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 = ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5;
        }

        ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5 = Mathf.RoundToInt(Random.Range(0.5f, ColorOfBlock + 0.4f));








        if (Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) == 0 | Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) == 1 | Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) == 2)
        {
            Invoke("Reset_TheStacker", 0f);
        }







        if (Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) == 3 | Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) == 4 | Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) == 5)
        {
            if (ColorOfBlock_NextBlock2 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3 & ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 & ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5)
            {
                Invoke("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5", 0f);
            }
            else
            {
                Invoke("Reset_TheStacker", 0f);
            }
        }




        if (Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) == 6 | Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) == 7 | Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) == 8)
        {
            if (ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 & ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5)
            {
                Invoke("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5", 0f);
            }
            else
            {
                Invoke("Reset_TheStacker", 0f);
            }
        }













        if (Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) >= 9)
        {
            if (ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4 == ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5)
            {
                Invoke("Decision_ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5", 0f);
            }
            else
            {
                Invoke("Reset_TheStacker", 0f);
            }
        }
    }













    //TheStackerリセット
    void Reset_TheStacker()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Reset_TheStacker was called");

        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_7.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_7.clip);

        Score += 10;

        TotalSummonedMobileBlock += 1;
        ComboSummonedMobileBlock += 1;
        if (ComboSummonedMobileBlock >= 2)
        {
            Ren = 0;
        }
        ComboDeletedColorGroup_2 = 0;

        Single = false;
        Double = false;
        Triple = false;

        CanInvokeSummoning_HoldBlock = true;
        CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;

        //CanInvokeIntermittentRightMovement_MobileBlock = false;
        //CanInvokeIntermittentLeftMovement_MobileBlock = false;
        CancelInvoke("ContinuousRightMovement_MobileBlock");
        CancelInvoke("ContinuousLeftMovement_MobileBlock");

        CanTransferColorOfBlock_NextBlock = true;
            
        KindOfBlock_MobileBlock = KindOfBlock_NextBlock1;
        KindOfBlock_NextBlock1 = KindOfBlock_NextBlock2;
        KindOfBlock_NextBlock2 = KindOfBlock_NextBlock3;
        KindOfBlock_NextBlock3 = KindOfBlock_NextBlock4;
        KindOfBlock_NextBlock4 = KindOfBlock_NextBlock5;
        KindOfBlock_NextBlock5 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, KindOfBlock + 1));

        DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock1;
        DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock1 = DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock2;
        DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock2 = DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock3;
        DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock3 = DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock4;
        DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock4 = DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock5;
        DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock5 = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 5));

        StartPositionOf1Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 11));
        StartPositionOf2Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 10));
        StartPositionOf3Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 9));
        StartPositionOf4Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 8));
        StartPositionOf5Cubes_MobileBlock = Mathf.FloorToInt(Random.Range(1, 7));

        Invoke("Summoning_MobileBlock", 0);
        Invoke("Destruction_NextBlock", 0);
        Invoke("Summoning_NextBlock", 0);
        Invoke("Destruction_ScoreBlock", 0);
        Invoke("Summoning_ScoreBlock", 0);
        Invoke("Destruction_BonusBlock", 3);
    }
    //GhostBlockリセット
    void Reset_GhostBlock()
    {
        StartPositionOfLine1_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine2_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine3_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine4_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine5_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine6_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine7_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine8_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine9_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine10_GhostBlock = 0;

        Transform Transform_PartMobileBlock = GameObject.Find("MobileBlock").transform.Find("PartsBlock").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
        foreach (Transform Transform_PartsMobileBlock in Transform_PartMobileBlock)
        {
            switch (Mathf.RoundToInt(Transform_PartsMobileBlock.transform.position.x - Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position.x))
            {
                case 1:
                    StartPositionOfLine1_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 2:
                    StartPositionOfLine2_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 3:
                    StartPositionOfLine3_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 4:
                    StartPositionOfLine4_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 5:
                    StartPositionOfLine5_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 6:
                    StartPositionOfLine6_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 7:
                    StartPositionOfLine7_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 8:
                    StartPositionOfLine8_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 9:
                    StartPositionOfLine9_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 10:
                    StartPositionOfLine10_GhostBlock += 1;
                    break;
            }
        }

        Invoke("Destruction_GhostBlock", 0);

    }
    //ColliderBlockリセット
    void Reset_ColliderBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Reset_ColliderBlock was called");

        if (FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }


        if (SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
        if (SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 3)
        {
            SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        }
    }

















        
    //MobileBlock生成
    void Summoning_MobileBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Summoning_MobileBlock was called");

        CanInvokeIntermittentRightMovement_MobileBlock = true;
        CanInvokeIntermittentLeftMovement_MobileBlock = true;
        CanInvokeSummoning_GhostBlock = true;

        switch (KindOfBlock_MobileBlock)

        {
            case 1:
                GameObject GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1 = Instantiate(Block1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.name = "MobileBlock";
                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.tag = "MobileBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        switch (StartPositionOf3Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 8:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 22, 0);
                                break;
                        }
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        switch (StartPositionOf2Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(1, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 8:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 9:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 22, 0);
                                break;
                        }
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        switch (StartPositionOf3Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 8:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 22, 0);
                                break;
                        }
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        switch (StartPositionOf2Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 8:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 9:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(10, 22, 0);
                                break;
                        }
                        break;
                }
                FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;

                SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                break;
            case 2:
                GameObject GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2 = Instantiate(Block2) as GameObject;
                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.name = "MobileBlock";
                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.tag = "MobileBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        switch (StartPositionOf3Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 8:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 22, 0);
                                break;
                        }
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        switch (StartPositionOf2Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(1, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 8:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 9:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 22, 0);
                                break;
                        }
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        switch (StartPositionOf3Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 8:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 22, 0);
                                break;
                        }
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        switch (StartPositionOf2Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 8:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 9:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block2.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(10, 22, 0);
                                break;
                        }
                        break;
                }
                FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;

                SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock = 3;
                break;
            case 3:
                GameObject GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3 = Instantiate(Block3) as GameObject;
                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.name = "MobileBlock";
                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.tag = "MobileBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        switch (StartPositionOf3Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 8:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 22, 0);
                                break;
                        }
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        switch (StartPositionOf2Cubes_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(1, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 5:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 6:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 22, 0);
                                break;
                            case 7:
                                GameObject_MobileBlock_Block3.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 22, 0);
                                break;

                                break;
                            case 8:
