        GameObject[] GameObject_MobileBlock_Block = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("MobileBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_MobileBlock_Blocks in GameObject_MobileBlock_Block)
        {
            GameObject_MobileBlock_Blocks.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker").transform;
        }

        Invoke("Staining_MobileBlock", 0f);
    }
    //NextBlock生成
    void Summoning_NextBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Summoning_NextBlock was called");

        switch (KindOfBlock_NextBlock1)
        {
            case 1:
                GameObject GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1 = Instantiate(Block1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.name = "NextBlock1";
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.tag = "NextBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, -0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block1.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 2:
                GameObject GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2 = Instantiate(Block2) as GameObject;
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.name = "NextBlock1";
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.tag = "NextBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, -0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block2.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 3:
                GameObject GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3 = Instantiate(Block3) as GameObject;
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.name = "NextBlock1";
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.tag = "NextBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, -0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block3.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 4:
                GameObject GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4 = Instantiate(Block4) as GameObject;
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.name = "NextBlock1";
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.tag = "NextBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, -0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block4.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 5:
                GameObject GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5 = Instantiate(Block5) as GameObject;
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5.name = "NextBlock1";
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5.tag = "NextBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, -0.25f, 0);

                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block5.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 6:
                GameObject GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6 = Instantiate(Block6) as GameObject;
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.name = "NextBlock1";
                GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.tag = "NextBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock1_Block6.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock1.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;

        switch (KindOfBlock_NextBlock2)
        {
            case 1:

                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block44.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock5.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block44.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block44.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock5.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block44.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block44.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock5.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 45:
                GameObject GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45 = Instantiate(Block45) as GameObject;
                GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.name = "NextBlock5";
                GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.tag = "NextBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_NextBlock5)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock5.transform.position + new Vector3(0, -0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock5.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock5.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_NextBlock5_Block45.transform.position = Transform_NextBlock5.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
        }

        GameObject[] GameObject_NextBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("NextBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_NextBlocks in GameObject_NextBlock)
        {
            GameObject_NextBlocks.transform.localScale = new Vector3(0.5f, 0.5f, 1);
            GameObject_NextBlocks.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker").transform;
        }

        Invoke("Destruction_CollidersBlock_NextBlock", 0f);
        Invoke("Staining_NextBlock", 0f);
    }
    //HoldBlock生成
    void Summoning_HoldBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Summoning_HoldBlock was called");

        switch (KindOfBlock_HoldBlock1)
        {
            case 1:
                GameObject GameObject_HoldBlock_Block1 = Instantiate(Block1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block1.name = "HoldBlock";
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block1.tag = "HoldBlock";

                GameObject GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40 = Instantiate(Block40) as GameObject;
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.name = "HoldBlock";
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.tag = "HoldBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block40.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 41:
                GameObject GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41 = Instantiate(Block41) as GameObject;
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.name = "HoldBlock";
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.tag = "HoldBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block41.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 42:
                GameObject GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42 = Instantiate(Block42) as GameObject;
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.name = "HoldBlock";
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.tag = "HoldBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block42.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 43:
                GameObject GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43 = Instantiate(Block43) as GameObject;
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.name = "HoldBlock";
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.tag = "HoldBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, -0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block43.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 44:
                GameObject GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44 = Instantiate(Block44) as GameObject;
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.name = "HoldBlock";
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.tag = "HoldBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, -0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block44.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
            case 45:
                GameObject GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45 = Instantiate(Block45) as GameObject;
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.name = "HoldBlock";
                GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.tag = "HoldBlock";
                switch (DirectionOfBlock_HoldBlock1)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, -0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, -90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(-0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0, 0.25f, 0);
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                        GameObject_HoldBlock_Block45.transform.position = Transform_HoldBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(0.25f, 0, 0);
                        break;
                }
                break;
        }

        GameObject[] GameObject_HoldBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("HoldBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_HoldBlocks in GameObject_HoldBlock)
        {
            GameObject_HoldBlocks.transform.localScale = new Vector3(0.5f, 0.5f, 1);
            GameObject_HoldBlocks.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker").transform;
        }

        Invoke("Destruction_CollidersBlock_HoldBlock", 0f);
        Invoke("Staining_HoldBlock", 0f);
    }
    //ScoreBlock生成
    void Summoning_ScoreBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Summoning_ScoreBlock was called");

        if (Score <= 99990)
        {
            //一桁目
            GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock1_Letter0 = Instantiate(Letter0) as GameObject;
            GameObject_ScoreBlock1_Letter0.name = "ScoreBlock1";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock1_Letter0.tag = "ScoreBlock";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock1_Letter0.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock1.transform.position;
            //二桁目
            if (Score >= 10)
            {
                switch (Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10) % 10)
                {
                    case 0:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter0 = Instantiate(Letter0) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter0.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter0.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter0.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 1:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter1 = Instantiate(Letter1) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter1.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter1.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter1.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter2 = Instantiate(Letter2) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter2.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter2.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter2.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter3 = Instantiate(Letter3) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter3.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter3.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter3.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter4 = Instantiate(Letter4) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter4.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter4.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter4.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 5:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter5 = Instantiate(Letter5) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter5.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter5.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter5.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 6:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter6 = Instantiate(Letter6) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter6.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter6.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter6.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 7:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter7 = Instantiate(Letter7) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter7.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter7.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter7.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 8:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter8 = Instantiate(Letter8) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter8.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter8.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter8.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 9:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter9 = Instantiate(Letter9) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter9.name = "ScoreBlock2";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter9.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter9.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
                        break;
                }
            }
            //三桁目
            if (Score >= 100)
            {
                switch (Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 100) % 10)
                {
                    case 0:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter0 = Instantiate(Letter0) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter0.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter0.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter0.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 1:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter1 = Instantiate(Letter1) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter1.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter1.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter1.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter2 = Instantiate(Letter2) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter2.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter2.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter2.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter3 = Instantiate(Letter3) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter3.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter3.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter3.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter4 = Instantiate(Letter4) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter4.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter4.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter4.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 5:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter5 = Instantiate(Letter5) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter5.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter5.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter5.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 6:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter6 = Instantiate(Letter6) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter6.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter6.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter6.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 7:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter7 = Instantiate(Letter7) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter7.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter7.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter7.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 8:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter8 = Instantiate(Letter8) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter8.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter8.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter8.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 9:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter9 = Instantiate(Letter9) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter9.name = "ScoreBlock3";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter9.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter9.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
                        break;
                }
            }
            //四桁目
            if (Score >= 1000)
            {
                switch (Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 1000) % 10)
                {
                    case 0:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter0 = Instantiate(Letter0) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter0.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter0.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter0.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 1:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter1 = Instantiate(Letter1) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter1.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter1.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter1.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter2 = Instantiate(Letter2) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter2.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter2.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter2.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter3 = Instantiate(Letter3) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter3.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter3.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter3.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter4 = Instantiate(Letter4) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter4.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter4.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter4.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 5:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter5 = Instantiate(Letter5) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter5.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter5.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter5.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 6:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter6 = Instantiate(Letter6) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter6.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter6.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter6.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 7:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter7 = Instantiate(Letter7) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter7.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter7.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter7.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 8:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter8 = Instantiate(Letter8) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter8.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter8.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter8.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 9:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter9 = Instantiate(Letter9) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter9.name = "ScoreBlock4";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter9.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter9.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
                        break;
                }
            }
            //五桁目
            if (Score >= 10000)
            {
                switch (Mathf.FloorToInt(Score / 10000) % 10)
                {
                    case 1:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter1 = Instantiate(Letter1) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter1.name = "ScoreBlock5";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter1.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter1.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 2:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter2 = Instantiate(Letter2) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter2.name = "ScoreBlock5";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter2.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter2.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 3:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter3 = Instantiate(Letter3) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter3.name = "ScoreBlock5";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter3.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter3.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 4:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter4 = Instantiate(Letter4) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter4.name = "ScoreBlock5";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter4.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter4.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 5:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter5 = Instantiate(Letter5) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter5.name = "ScoreBlock5";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter5.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter5.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 6:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter6 = Instantiate(Letter6) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter6.name = "ScoreBlock5";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter6.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter6.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 7:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter7 = Instantiate(Letter7) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter7.name = "ScoreBlock5";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter7.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter7.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 8:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter8 = Instantiate(Letter8) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter8.name = "ScoreBlock5";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter8.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter8.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
                        break;
                    case 9:
                        GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter9 = Instantiate(Letter9) as GameObject;
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter9.name = "ScoreBlock5";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter9.tag = "ScoreBlock";
                        GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter9.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
                        break;
                }
            }
        }
        if (Score > 99990)
        {
            //一桁目
            GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock1_Letter9 = Instantiate(Letter9) as GameObject;
            GameObject_ScoreBlock1_Letter9.name = "ScoreBlock1";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock1_Letter9.tag = "ScoreBlock";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock1_Letter9.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock1.transform.position;
            //二桁目
            GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter9 = Instantiate(Letter9) as GameObject;
            GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter9.name = "ScoreBlock2";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter9.tag = "ScoreBlock";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock2_Letter9.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock2.transform.position;
            //三桁目
            GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter9 = Instantiate(Letter9) as GameObject;
            GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter9.name = "ScoreBlock3";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter9.tag = "ScoreBlock";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock3_Letter9.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock3.transform.position;
            //四桁目
            GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter9 = Instantiate(Letter9) as GameObject;
            GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter9.name = "ScoreBlock4";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter9.tag = "ScoreBlock";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock4_Letter9.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock4.transform.position;
            //五桁目
            GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter9 = Instantiate(Letter9) as GameObject;
            GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter9.name = "ScoreBlock5";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter9.tag = "ScoreBlock";
            GameObject_ScoreBlock5_Letter9.transform.position = Transform_ScoreBlock5.transform.position;
        }

        GameObject[] GameObject_ScoreBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("ScoreBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlocks in GameObject_ScoreBlock)
        {
            GameObject_ScoreBlocks.transform.localScale = new Vector3(0.4f, 0.4f, 1);
            GameObject_ScoreBlocks.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker").transform;
        }

        Invoke("Staining_ScoreBlock", 0f);
    }
    //BonusBlock生成
    void Summoning_BonusBlock()
    {
        //CLEAR
        if (GameObject.FindWithTag("OtherCube") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_1") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_1") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_1") == null)
        {
            GameObject GameObject_BonusBlock1_Bonus1 = Instantiate(Text1) as GameObject;
            GameObject_BonusBlock1_Bonus1.name = "BonusBlock1";
            GameObject_BonusBlock1_Bonus1.tag = "BonusBlock";
            switch (StartPosition_BonusBlock)
            {
                case 1:
                    GameObject_BonusBlock1_Bonus1.transform.position = Transform_BonusBlock1.transform.position;
                    StartPosition_BonusBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 2:
                    GameObject_BonusBlock1_Bonus1.transform.position = Transform_BonusBlock2.transform.position;
                    StartPosition_BonusBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 3:
                    GameObject_BonusBlock1_Bonus1.transform.position = Transform_BonusBlock3.transform.position;
                    StartPosition_BonusBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 4:
                    GameObject_BonusBlock1_Bonus1.transform.position = Transform_BonusBlock4.transform.position;
                    StartPosition_BonusBlock += 1;
                    break;
                case 5:
                    GameObject_BonusBlock1_Bonus1.transform.position = Transform_BonusBlock5.transform.position;
                    StartPosition_BonusBlock += 1;
                    break;
            }
        }
        //COMBO
        if (ComboDeletedColorGroup_2 != 0)
        {
            switch (ComboDeletedColorGroup_2)
            {
                case 1:
                    GameObject GameObject_BonusBlock2_Bonus2 = Instantiate(Text2) as GameObject;
                    GameObject_BonusBlock2_Bonus2.name = "BonusBlock2";
                    GameObject_BonusBlock2_Bonus2.tag = "BonusBlock";
                    switch (StartPosition_BonusBlock)
                    {
                        case 1:
                            GameObject_BonusBlock2_Bonus2.transform.position = Transform_BonusBlock1.transform.position;
                            StartPosition_BonusBlock += 1;
                            break;
                        case 2:

        GameObject[] GameObject_BonusBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BonusBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_BonusBlocks in GameObject_BonusBlock)
        {
            GameObject_BonusBlocks.transform.localScale = new Vector3(0.15f, 0.15f, 1);
            GameObject_BonusBlocks.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker").transform;
        }





    }
    //GhostBlock生成
    void Summoning_GhostBlock()
    {
        if (StartPositionOfLine1_GhostBlock != 0)
        {
            if (StartPositionOfLine1_GhostBlock >= 1)
            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.name = "GhostBlock1";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(1, 1, 0);
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine1_GhostBlock >= 2)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock1").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock1").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock1").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine1_GhostBlock >= 3)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock1").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock1").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -2, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock1").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine1_GhostBlock >= 4)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock1").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock1").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -3, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock1").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
        }

        if (StartPositionOfLine2_GhostBlock != 0)
        {
            if (StartPositionOfLine2_GhostBlock >= 1)
            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.name = "GhostBlock2";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(2, 1, 0);
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine2_GhostBlock >= 2)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock2").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock2").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock2").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine2_GhostBlock >= 3)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock2").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock2").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -2, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock2").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine2_GhostBlock >= 4)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock2").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock2").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -3, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock2").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
        }

        if (StartPositionOfLine3_GhostBlock != 0)
        {
            if (StartPositionOfLine3_GhostBlock >= 1)
            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.name = "GhostBlock3";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(3, 1, 0);
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine3_GhostBlock >= 2)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock3").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock3").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock3").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine3_GhostBlock >= 3)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock3").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock3").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -2, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock3").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine3_GhostBlock >= 4)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock3").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock3").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -3, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock3").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
        }

        if (StartPositionOfLine4_GhostBlock != 0)
        {
            if (StartPositionOfLine4_GhostBlock >= 1)
            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.name = "GhostBlock4";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(4, 1, 0);
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine4_GhostBlock >= 2)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock4").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock4").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock4").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine4_GhostBlock >= 3)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock4").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock4").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -2, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock4").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine4_GhostBlock >= 4)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock4").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock4").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -3, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock4").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
        }

        if (StartPositionOfLine5_GhostBlock != 0)
        {
            if (StartPositionOfLine5_GhostBlock >= 1)
            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.name = "GhostBlock5";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(5, 1, 0);
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine5_GhostBlock >= 2)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock5").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock5").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock5").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine5_GhostBlock >= 3)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock5").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock5").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -2, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock5").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine5_GhostBlock >= 4)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock5").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock5").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -3, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock5").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
        }

        if (StartPositionOfLine6_GhostBlock != 0)
        {
            if (StartPositionOfLine6_GhostBlock >= 1)
            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.name = "GhostBlock6";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(6, 1, 0);
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine6_GhostBlock >= 2)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock6").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock6").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock6").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine6_GhostBlock >= 3)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock6").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock6").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -2, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock6").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine6_GhostBlock >= 4)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock6").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock6").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -3, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock6").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
        }

        if (StartPositionOfLine7_GhostBlock != 0)
        {
            if (StartPositionOfLine7_GhostBlock >= 1)
            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.name = "GhostBlock7";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(7, 1, 0);
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine7_GhostBlock >= 2)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock7").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock7").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock7").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine7_GhostBlock >= 3)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock7").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock7").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -2, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock7").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine7_GhostBlock >= 4)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock7").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock7").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -3, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock7").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
        }

        if (StartPositionOfLine8_GhostBlock != 0)
        {
            if (StartPositionOfLine8_GhostBlock >= 1)
            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.name = "GhostBlock8";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(8, 1, 0);
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine8_GhostBlock >= 2)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock8").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.position = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock8").transform.position + new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock8").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine8_GhostBlock >= 3)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock8").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";

                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock8").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine8_GhostBlock >= 4)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock8").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";

                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock8").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
        }

        {

            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;

                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.transform.position = Transform_MobileBlock.transform.position + new Vector3(9, 1, 0);

                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock9").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;

                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock9").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }
            if (StartPositionOfLine9_GhostBlock >= 4)
            {
                GameObject.Find("GhostBlock9").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform.Find("PartGhost_L").name = "PartGhost";

                GameObject GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost = Instantiate(PartGhost) as GameObject;
                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.name = "PartGhost_L";

                GameObject_PartGhostBlock_PartGhost.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("GhostBlock9").transform.Find("PartsGhost").transform;
            }

            {
                GameObject GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1 = Instantiate(Ghost1) as GameObject;
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.name = "GhostBlock10";
                GameObject_GhostBlock_Ghost1.tag = "GhostBlock";

            }
        }
    }








    //MobileBlock染色
    void Staining_MobileBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Staining_MobileBlock was called");

        Transform Transform_PartMobileBlock = GameObject.Find("MobileBlock").transform.Find("PartsBlock").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
        foreach (Transform Transform_PartsMobileBlock in Transform_PartMobileBlock)
        {
            Transform_PartsMobileBlock.name = "PartMobileBlock";
            Transform_PartsMobileBlock.tag = "PartMobileBlock";
            Transform_PartsMobileBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");
            Transform_PartsMobileBlock.transform.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().ColorOfPartMobileBlock = ColorOfBlock_MobileBlock;

            switch (ColorOfBlock_MobileBlock)
            {
                case 1:
                    //赤色
                    Transform_PartsMobileBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Red;
                    Transform_PartsMobileBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Red);
                    break;
                case 2:
                    //緑色
                    Transform_PartsMobileBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Green;
                    Transform_PartsMobileBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Green);
                    break;
                case 3:
                    //青色
                    Transform_PartsMobileBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Blue;
                    Transform_PartsMobileBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Blue);
                    break;
            }
        }
        GameObject[] GameObject_PartMobileBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("PartMobileBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_PartsMobileBlock in GameObject_PartMobileBlock)
        {
            GameObject_PartsMobileBlock.layer = 9;
        }

        if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
        {
            Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
        }
    }
    //NextBlock染色
    void Staining_NextBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Staining_NextBlock was called");

        //NextBlock1染色
        Transform Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock1_Block = GameObject.Find("NextBlock1").transform.Find("PartsBlock").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
        foreach (Transform Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock1_Block in Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock1_Block)
        {
            Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock1_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");

            switch (ColorOfBlock_NextBlock1)
            {
                case 1:
                    //赤色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock1_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Red;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock1_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Red);
                    break;
                case 2:
                    //緑色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock1_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Green;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock1_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Green);
                    break;
                case 3:
                    //青色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock1_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Blue;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock1_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Blue);
                    break;
            }
        }
        //NextBlock2染色
        Transform Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock2_Block = GameObject.Find("NextBlock2").transform.Find("PartsBlock").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
        foreach (Transform Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock2_Block in Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock2_Block)
        {
            Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock2_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");

            switch (ColorOfBlock_NextBlock2)
            {
                case 1:
                    //赤色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock2_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Red;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock2_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Red);
                    break;
                case 2:
                    //緑色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock2_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Green;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock2_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Green);
                    break;
                case 3:
                    //青色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock2_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Blue;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock2_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Blue);
                    break;
            }
        }
        //NextBlock3染色
        Transform Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock3_Block = GameObject.Find("NextBlock3").transform.Find("PartsBlock").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
        foreach (Transform Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock3_Block in Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock3_Block)
        {
            Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock3_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");

            switch (ColorOfBlock_NextBlock3)
            {
                case 1:
                    //赤色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock3_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Red;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock3_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Red);
                    break;
                case 2:
                    //緑色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock3_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Green;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock3_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Green);
                    break;
                case 3:
                    //青色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock3_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Blue;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock3_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Blue);
                    break;
            }
        }
        //NextBlock4染色
        Transform Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock4_Block = GameObject.Find("NextBlock4").transform.Find("PartsBlock").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
        foreach (Transform Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock4_Block in Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock4_Block)
        {
            Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock4_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");

            switch (ColorOfBlock_NextBlock4)
            {
                case 1:
                    //赤色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock4_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Red;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock4_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Red);
                    break;
                case 2:
                    //緑色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock4_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Green;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock4_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Green);
                    break;
                case 3:
                    //青色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock4_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Blue;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock4_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Blue);
                    break;
            }
        }
        //NextBlock5染色
        Transform Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock5_Block = GameObject.Find("NextBlock5").transform.Find("PartsBlock").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
        foreach (Transform Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock5_Block in Transform_PartGameObject_NextBlock5_Block)
        {
            Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock5_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");

            switch (ColorOfBlock_NextBlock5)
            {
                case 1:
                    //赤色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock5_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Red;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock5_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Red);
                    break;
                case 2:
                    //緑色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock5_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Green;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock5_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Green);
                    break;
                case 3:
                    //青色
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock5_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Blue;
                    Transform_PartsGameObject_NextBlock5_Block.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Blue);
                    break;
            }
        }
    }
    //HoldBlock染色

            Transform_PartsHoldBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");

                    Transform_PartsHoldBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Red;
                    Transform_PartsHoldBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Red);
                    break;
                case 2:

                    Transform_PartsHoldBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Green);
