                    Transform_PartsHoldBlock.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Blue);
                    break;
            }
        }
    }
    //ScoreBlock染色
    void Staining_ScoreBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Staining_ScoreBlock was called");

        //ScoreBlock1染色 
        if (GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock1") != null)
        {
            Transform Transform_PartScoreBlock1 = GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock1").transform.Find("PartsLetter").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
            foreach (Transform Transform_PartsScoreBlock1 in Transform_PartScoreBlock1)
            {
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock1.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock1.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Yellow;
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock1.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Yellow);
            }
        }
        //ScoreBlock2染色
        if (GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock2") != null)
        {
            Transform Transform_PartScoreBlock2 = GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock2").transform.Find("PartsLetter").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
            foreach (Transform Transform_PartsScoreBlock2 in Transform_PartScoreBlock2)
            {
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock2.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock2.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Yellow;
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock2.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Yellow);
            }
        }
        //ScoreBlock3染色
        if (GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock3") != null)
        {
            Transform Transform_PartScoreBlock3 = GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock3").transform.Find("PartsLetter").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
            foreach (Transform Transform_PartsScoreBlock3 in Transform_PartScoreBlock3)
            {
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock3.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock3.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Yellow;
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock3.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Yellow);
            }
        }
        //ScoreBlock4染色
        if (GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock4") != null)
        {
            Transform Transform_PartScoreBlock4 = GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock4").transform.Find("PartsLetter").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
            foreach (Transform Transform_PartsScoreBlock4 in Transform_PartScoreBlock4)
            {
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock4.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock4.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Yellow;
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock4.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Yellow);
            }
        }
        //ScoreBlock5染色
        if (GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock5") != null)
        {
            Transform Transform_PartScoreBlock5 = GameObject.Find("ScoreBlock5").transform.Find("PartsLetter").transform.GetComponentInChildren<Transform>();
            foreach (Transform Transform_PartsScoreBlock5 in Transform_PartScoreBlock5)
            {
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock5.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.EnableKeyword("_EMISSION");
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock5.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.color = Albedo_Yellow;
                Transform_PartsScoreBlock5.transform.GetComponent<Renderer>().material.SetColor("_EmissionColor", Emission_Yellow);
            }
        }
    }





















    //MobileBlock自由落下
    void FreeFalling_MobileBlock()
    {
        CanInvokeFreeFalling_MobileBlock = true;
        Invoke("IntermittentDownMovement_MobileBlock", 0);
    }
















    //MobileBlock断続操作(下移動)
    void IntermittentDownMovement_MobileBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("IntermittentDownMovement_MobileBlock was called");

        if (GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock") != null)
        {
            if (
                FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0
                )
            {
                switch (KindOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                {
                    case 1:
                        switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                        {
                            case 1:
                                if (FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                                {
                                    CanPlayMobileBlockLandingSound = true;
                                    CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                    CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                    GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                                    Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                }
                                else
                                {
                                    if (CanPlayMobileBlockLandingSound == true)
                                    {
                                        CanPlayMobileBlockLandingSound = false;
                                        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_5.Play();
                                    }
                                    if (CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock == true)
                                    {
                                        CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = false;
                                        Invoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock", 0.5f);
                                    }
                                }
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                if (FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                                {
                                    CanPlayMobileBlockLandingSound = true;
                                    CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                    CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                    GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                                    Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                }
                                else
                                {

                                        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_5.Play();
                                    }
                                    if (CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock == true)
                                    {
                                        CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = false;
                                        Invoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock", 0.5f);
                                    }
                                }
                                break;
                            case 3:
                                if (FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                                {
                                    CanPlayMobileBlockLandingSound = true;
                                    CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                    CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                    GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                                    Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                }

                                    }
                                    if (CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock == true)
                                    {
                                        CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = false;
                                        Invoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock", 0.5f);
                                    }
                                }
                                break;
                            case 4:
                                if (FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                                {
                                    CanPlayMobileBlockLandingSound = true;
                                    CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                    CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                    GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, -1, 0);

                                break;

                        break;

                                }

                                }

                                        CanPlayMobileBlockLandingSound = false;

                                    }
                                    if (CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock == true)
                                    {
                                        CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = false;
                                        Invoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock", 0.5f);
                                    }
                                }
                                break;
                            case 2:
                                if (FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                                {
                                    CanPlayMobileBlockLandingSound = true;
                                    CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                    CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                    GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                                    Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                }
                                else

    }
    //MobileBlock断続操作(右移動)
    void IntermittentRightMovement_MobileBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("IntermittentRightMovement_MobileBlock was called");

        if (
                FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0
                )
        {
            switch (KindOfBlock_MobileBlock)
            {
                case 1:
                    switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                    {
                        case 1:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }
                            }
                            break;
                        case 2:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 3:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 4:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                    }
                    break;
                case 2:
                    switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                    {
                        case 1:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 2:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)

                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                    }
                    break;
                case 45:
                    switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                    {
                        case 1:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 2:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 3:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 4:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                    }
                    break;
            }
        }


    }
    //MobileBlock連続操作(右移動)
    void ContinuousRightMovement_MobileBlock()
    {
        if (D & !S & !A & !E & !Q)
        {
            Invoke("ContinuousRightMovement_MobileBlock", 0.05f);
            Invoke("IntermittentRightMovement_MobileBlock", 0);
        }
    }
    //MobileBlock断続操作(左移動)
    void IntermittentLeftMovement_MobileBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("IntermittentLeftMovement_MobileBlock was called");

        if (
                FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0
                )
        {
            switch (KindOfBlock_MobileBlock)
            {
                case 1:
                    switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                    {

                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;

                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                                }
                            }
                            break;

    }
    //MobileBlock連続操作(左移動)
    void ContinuousLeftMovement_MobileBlock()
    {
        if (A & !S & !D & !E & !Q)
        {
            Invoke("ContinuousLeftMovement_MobileBlock", 0.05f);
            Invoke("IntermittentLeftMovement_MobileBlock", 0);
        }
    }
    //MobileBlock断続操作(右回転)
    void IntermittentRightRoll_MobileBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("IntermittentRightRoll_MobileBlock was called");

        if (
                FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
                SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0
                )
        {
            //第一操作
            switch (KindOfBlock_MobileBlock)
            {
                case 1:
                    switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                    {
                        case 1:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 2;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 270);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 2:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 3;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 3:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 4:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 1;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                    }
                    break;
                case 2:
                    switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                    {
                        case 1:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 2;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 270);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 2:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 3;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 3:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 4:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 1;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                    }
                    break;
                case 3:
                    switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                    {
                        case 1:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 2;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 270);

                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 1;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_2.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(-1, 0, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_3.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                    }
                    break;
            }
        }

    }
    //MobileBlock断続操作(左回転)
    void IntermittentLeftRoll_MobileBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("IntermittentLeftRoll_MobileBlock was called");

        if (
        FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0 &
        SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock != 0
        )
        {
            //第一操作
            switch (KindOfBlock_MobileBlock)
            {
                case 1:
                    switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                    {
                        case 1:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 2:
                            if (FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 1;

            //第二操作
            switch (KindOfBlock_MobileBlock)
            {
                case 1:
                    switch (DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock)
                    {
                        case 1:
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);

                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, 1, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);

                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, 1, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 2:
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 1;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 0);

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_1.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(1, 0, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);

                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, 1, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);

                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, 1, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 3:
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 2;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 270);

                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, -1, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);

                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, 1, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);

                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, 1, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                        case 4:
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 3;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 180);

                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_2.Play();
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(-1, 0, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);

                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, 1, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            if (SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock == 1 & SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2 & SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock == 2)
                            {
                                CanInvokeDisassembly_MobileBlock = true;
                                CancelInvoke("Disassembly_MobileBlock");

                                DirectionOfBlock_MobileBlock = 4;
                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.eulerAngles = new Vector3(0, 0, 90);

                                GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock").transform.position += new Vector3(0, 1, 0);
                                AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_4.clip);
                                Invoke("Reset_ColliderBlock", 0);
                                if (CanInvokeReset_GhostBlock == true)
                                {
                                    Invoke("Reset_GhostBlock", 0);
                                }

                            }
                            break;
                    }
                    break;
            }
        }
    }
























    //MobileBlock分解
    void Disassembly_MobileBlock()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Disassembly_MovementBlock was colled");

        GameObject[] GameObject_PartMobileBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("PartMobileBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_PartsMobileBlock in GameObject_PartMobileBlock)
        {
            GameObject_PartsMobileBlock.GetComponent<PartBlockTheStacker_Control>().Available_PartMobileBlock = true;
            GameObject_PartsMobileBlock.transform.parent = null;
            GameObject_PartsMobileBlock.transform.parent = GameObject.Find("OtherResourcesTheStacker").transform;
        }

        StartPositionOfLine1_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine2_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine3_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine4_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine5_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine6_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine7_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine8_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine9_GhostBlock = 0;
        StartPositionOfLine10_GhostBlock = 0;

        FirstColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_13OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        FirstColliderBlock_14OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;

        SecondColliderBlock_1OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_2OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_3OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_4OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_5OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_6OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_7OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_8OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_9OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_10OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_11OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;
        SecondColliderBlock_12OverlapPartMobileBlock = 0;

        Destroy(GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock"));
    }








    //MobileBlock消去
    void Destruction_MobileBlock()
    {
        Destroy(GameObject.FindWithTag("MobileBlock"));
    }
    //NextBlock消去
    void Destruction_NextBlock()
    {
        GameObject[] GameObject_NextBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("NextBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_NextBlocks in GameObject_NextBlock)
        {
            Destroy(GameObject_NextBlocks);
        }
    }
    //HoldBlock消去
    void Destruction_HoldBlock()
    {
        Destroy(GameObject.FindWithTag("HoldBlock"));
    }
    //ScoreBlock消去
    void Destruction_ScoreBlock()
    {
        GameObject[] GameObject_ScoreBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("ScoreBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_ScoreBlocks in GameObject_ScoreBlock)
        {
            Destroy(GameObject_ScoreBlocks);
        }
    }
    //BonusBlock消去
    void Destruction_BonusBlock()
    {
        GameObject[] GameObject_BonusBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BonusBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_BonusBlocks in GameObject_BonusBlock)
        {
            Destroy(GameObject_BonusBlocks);
        }

        StartPosition_BonusBlock = 1;
    }
    //GhostBlock消去
    void Destruction_GhostBlock()
    {
        GameObject[] GameObject_GhostBlock = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GhostBlock");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_GhostBlocks in GameObject_GhostBlock)
        {
            Destroy(GameObject_GhostBlocks);
        }

        if (CanInvokeSummoning_GhostBlock == true)
        {
            Invoke("Summoning_GhostBlock", 0);
        }
    }





    //ScoreTheStacaker換算
    void Calculate_ScoreTheStacaker()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Calculate_ScoreTheStacaker was called");

        CanInvokeCalculate_ScoreTheStacaker = true;

        GameObject[] GameObject_RedCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("RedCube_2");
        TotalDeletedColorCube_2 += GameObject_RedCube_2.Length;
        ComboDeletedColorCube_2 += GameObject_RedCube_2.Length;

        GameObject[] GameObject_GreenCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GreenCube_2");
        TotalDeletedColorCube_2 += GameObject_GreenCube_2.Length;
        ComboDeletedColorCube_2 += GameObject_GreenCube_2.Length;

        GameObject[] GameObject_BlueCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BlueCube_2");
        TotalDeletedColorCube_2 += GameObject_BlueCube_2.Length;
        ComboDeletedColorCube_2 += GameObject_BlueCube_2.Length;




        //基本換算
        Score += (ComboDeletedColorCube_2 * 30);
        ComboDeletedColorCube_2 = 0;
        //CLEAR換算
        if (GameObject.FindWithTag("OtherCube") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_1") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_1") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_1") == null)
        {
            //Debug.Log("CLEAR");

            Score += 300;
        }
        //COMBO換算
        ComboDeletedColorGroup_2 += 1;
        if (ComboDeletedColorGroup_2 == 1)
        {
            //Debug.Log("1Combo");
        }
        else if (ComboDeletedColorGroup_2 >= 2)
        {
            //Debug.Log(ComboDeletedColorGroup_2 + "Combo");

            Score += 750;
        }
        //REN換算
        if (ComboSummonedMobileBlock == 1)
        {
            Ren += 1;
        }
        if (ComboSummonedMobileBlock >= 2)
        {
            Ren = 1;
        }
        ComboSummonedMobileBlock = 0;
        if (Ren == 1)
        {
            //Debug.Log("1Ren");
        }
        else if (Ren >= 2)
        {
            //Debug.Log(Ren + "Ren");

            Score += 150;
        }
        //SINGLE
        if (
            GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") == null |
            GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") == null |
            GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") != null
            )
        {
            Single = true;
            Double = false;
            Triple = false;
        }
        else
        {
            Single = false;
        }
        //DOUBLE
        if (
            GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") == null |
            GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") != null |
            GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") == null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") != null
            )
        {
            Single = false;
            Double = true;
            Triple = false;

            Score += 2000;
        }
        else
        {
            Double = false;
        }
        //TRIPLE
        if (GameObject.FindWithTag("RedCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("GreenCube_2") != null & GameObject.FindWithTag("BlueCube_2") != null)
        {
            Single = false;
            Double = false;
            Triple = true;

            Score += 3000;
        }
        else
        {
            Triple = false;
        }







        TotalDeletedColorGroup_2 += 1;

        Invoke("Destruction_ColorCube_2", 0);

    }







    //ColorCube_2消去
    void Destruction_ColorCube_2()
    {
        //Debug.Log("Destruction_ColorCube_2 was called");

        AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_6.PlayOneShot(AudioSource_AudioSourcePlayerTheStacker_6.clip);

        GameObject[] GameObject_RedCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("RedCube_2");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_RedCubes_2 in GameObject_RedCube_2)
        {
            Destroy(GameObject_RedCubes_2);
        }

        GameObject[] GameObject_GreenCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("GreenCube_2");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_GreenCubes_2 in GameObject_GreenCube_2)
        {
            Destroy(GameObject_GreenCubes_2);
        }

        GameObject[] GameObject_BlueCube_2 = GameObject.FindGameObjectsWithTag("BlueCube_2");
        foreach (GameObject GameObject_BlueCubes_2 in GameObject_BlueCube_2)
        {
            Destroy(GameObject_BlueCubes_2);
        }











        Invoke("Destruction_ScoreBlock", 0);
        Invoke("Summoning_ScoreBlock", 0);
        CancelInvoke("Destruction_BonusBlock");
        Invoke("Destruction_BonusBlock", 0);
        Invoke("Summoning_BonusBlock", 0);
    }








    //CollidersBlock_NextBlock消去
    void Destruction_CollidersBlock_NextBlock()
    {
        GameObject CollidersBlock_NextBlock1 = GameObject.Find("NextBlock1").transform.Find("CollidersBlock").gameObject;
        Destroy(CollidersBlock_NextBlock1);
        GameObject CollidersBlock_NextBlock2 = GameObject.Find("NextBlock2").transform.Find("CollidersBlock").gameObject;
        Destroy(CollidersBlock_NextBlock2);
        GameObject CollidersBlock_NextBlock3 = GameObject.Find("NextBlock3").transform.Find("CollidersBlock").gameObject;
        Destroy(CollidersBlock_NextBlock3);
        GameObject CollidersBlock_NextBlock4 = GameObject.Find("NextBlock4").transform.Find("CollidersBlock").gameObject;
        Destroy(CollidersBlock_NextBlock4);
        GameObject CollidersBlock_NextBlock5 = GameObject.Find("NextBlock5").transform.Find("CollidersBlock").gameObject;
        Destroy(CollidersBlock_NextBlock5);
    }
    //CollidersBlock_HoldBlock消去
    void Destruction_CollidersBlock_HoldBlock()
    {
        GameObject CollidersBlock_HoldBlock = GameObject.Find("HoldBlock").transform.Find("CollidersBlock").gameObject;
        Destroy(CollidersBlock_HoldBlock);
    }

}
